title: (fixed) Vampire the Masquerade Bloodlines - DVD with patch and n
description:
Alright after the little headache i had yesterday and for no apparent reason not working 100% right I remade the dvd complete with the 4.7 patch and a no-cd crack (you NEED the patch and crack or it wont load/play right!!)

Any way just download, mount/burn then follow the instructions in the readme found in the _Patches_ folder (thats where the patch and no-cd crack are)

I just installed, patched, and cracked the game then got past the small tutorial bit in the beginning of the game then uninstalled and did it again to make sure and it worked fine so if you do what i say in there, it will work fine...if it doesn&#039;t for some reason after you do everything needed I&#039;m going to go more batshit than a Malkavian high on crack and we all know how bad that is! lol

Any way yeah, enjoy the newly WORKING version of this thing...... I blame the sabbot for why the other one didn&#039;t work.... if this one doesn&#039;t work for you.... blame the Camerila and join the anarchs >.> lol
